array.name: FAQsQuestions
array.item: How do I connect to my LegoEv3?
Can I configure the robot ports?

array.name: FAQsAnswers
array.item: To connect to LegoEv3, you need to click on connect in the home view
To control the LegoEv3 you have to go to the home and select Test, otherwise if you plan to perform functions, you have to go to Advanced Actions
No, compatibility with the IOS system is not available at the moment.
Yes, by default we have inserted a configuration to control the robot, but at will they can be replaced with your own configurations

In this section you can set the port to the sensor you are using so that it will work correctly. The motors can be configured from Port A to D, and the sensors from Port 1 to 4. You can also check the Bluetooth connection and review the app
